Description

 

Collect State forms and other paper work with a single click.
Convenient. Secure. 100% Legit.
Organized by Student, and available for you at all times.
New Student enrollments. Made super easy.
Parents love it. No wasted paper. Good karma too!
Request and Receive documents online. Clutter free.
Let technology work for you. Auto-organized by Student. Download whenever you need.
How about, your smart phone (tablet) as your Attendance sheet?
Yep. That's right. Sign-In and Sign-Out Students just right. Works for your Staff too!
Reliable and Professional looking emails & newletters at your disposal.
Send to individual parent (or) entire classroom (or) to new prospects. As simple as that.
Invite and manage Teachers by Classroom. Works for temporary Staff too!
As an Administrator, you can provide and revoke Teacher access at anytime you want.
Your classroom needs a Daily Agenda.
Your Teachers needs to follow. Your Parents wants to know. Know by minute.
Parents love to connect to the Classroom.
Whether it is a picture, video or a moment. Capture your classroom in action.
Teachers daily agenda by Classroom in their pocket.
From taking attendance -to- messaging a parent -to- sharing moments.
Automatically created SCHOOL ROSTER saves you a ton of time!
Ready to Download & Print.
Securely send and receive invoice to Parents.
Funds disbursed in few days*
Wouldn't it be nice to have a dedicated wesbite for Student Enrollments?
In fact, a lot of centers use it as main website.
Real humans to address real issues.
We are committed to make it right.
